title: issues with reconnecting
body: well short story i dced and reconnected a few times and they all where within the 5min frame and i moved in game so i dont see why its giving me a ban. well i got a ban for with of five games? is there any way to drop them besides playing five games.

replies.body:
There's no way to get rid of the Leaverbuster penalties than working through them by playing games, no. It sounds like you may have an *unstable connection* to the gameservers, so I really recommend checking our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) out for steps that often resolves these issues.

Let me know if you encounter further disconnections after you've worked through the guide.
it still is doing it. just getting into the game is all.

Since you're still having issues after having worked through that guide, we'll need to take a deeper look at your network configuration in order to resolve this. Grab some system logs with [**our Toolkit**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then be sure to attach them to your [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you run into issues.
